resources.string: "1. at what temperature should you check oil in a car?"
"your input is incorrect on question 1. the answer is either: cold, warm, or hot."
"normal operating temp of an engine is hot; oil expands when hot; contaminants suspended better when hot."

"2. when putting a wheel on:
· what pattern should the wheels be tightened in?
· what load should they have on them when torqued?
(2 correct)"
"you have to select at least/most two options on question 2."

"the wheel should be gradually tightened in an opposing/star manner when the car is lifted in the air. this will allow the wheel to pull evenly to the hub, and prevent damage. the wheel should be torqued when partially on the ground."
"3. if a drain plug has a replaceable washer, you should (2 correct):"
"you have to select at least/most two options on question 3."
"crush washers must "always" be replaced and torqued to the correct specification so as to provide a tight seal against leaks"
"4. with a normal alignment on a crowned road, a vehicle should drift _____ in the left lane and _____ in the right lane."
"you have to select at least one option on question 4."

"crowned roads direct water away from the roadway. this means the high point of the road is in the center. which means a vehicle with a normal alignment will track left in the left lane, and right in the right."
